医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
内分泌治疗对乳腺癌幸存者糖尿病的代谢影响研究人员讨论了内分泌治疗的历史，强调了它们的不良代谢影响，并强调需要更好的糖尿病生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/The-metabolic-effects-of-endocrine-therapy-on-diabetes-mellitus-in-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/The-metabolic-effects-of-endocrine-therapy-on-diabetes-mellitus-in-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1ef2984-ff14-4cc8-b116-0f69c65c33c6 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 11:43:00 -0400 The metabolic effects of endocrine therapy on diabetes mellitus in breast cancer survivors
在有趣的研究中，音乐会观众的身体和情感同步研究人员检查了现场古典音乐会期间观众的生理和运动同步性，并探讨了它们与审美体验和个人性格特征的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Concert-goers-sync-up-physically-and-emotionally-in-fascinating-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Concert-goers-sync-up-physically-and-emotionally-in-fascinating-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e821f7e8-f477-4035-9da7-9968c95dac6d Thu, 05 Oct 2023 11:32:00 -0400 Concert-goers sync up physically and emotionally in fascinating study

完成人类基因目录的进展和挑战一组作者回顾了人类基因组注释的进展和挑战，包括蛋白质编码基因、亚型和非编码RNA，并倡导建立临床使用的通用注释标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Progress-and-challenges-in-completing-the- human-gene-catalogue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Progress-and-challenges-in-completing-the- human-gene-catalogue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90716f58-85dc-4296-8630-25416094b0a0 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 07:56:00 -0400 Progress and challenges in completing the human gene catalogue
美联储限制使用预测软件，限制对 Medicare Advantage 患者的护理三月份，朱迪思·沙利文 (Judith Sullivan) 在康涅狄格州一家疗养院接受大手术后康复，当时她从 Medicare Advantage 计划中得到了令人惊讶的消息：该计划将不再支付她的护理费用，因为她的情况已经足够好，可以回家了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Feds-rein-in-use-of-predictive-software-that-limits-care-for-Medicare-Advantage-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Feds-rein-in-use-of-predictive-software-that-limits-care-for-Medicare-Advantage-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d39022c9-2b57-43c0-8fd8-076d18b53fa0 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 07:20:00 -0400 Feds rein in use of predictive software that limits care for Medicare Advantage patients
